name: Wild West (s_b_c)
description:
This is my entry for the 50$ [CodeGame] Challenge.

Ride a dinosaur as far as possible in the wild west!

Controls:

  • w / up arrow / click on the up part of the screen - climb the lantern
  • s / down arrow / click on the down part of the screen - speed up the dinosaur
  • space / click on any part of the screen - get off the lantern
  • r - restart

The further you go, the higher the speed of the train.

Enjoy :)
